gdpcore
Class BinList

java.lang.Object
  gdpcore.BinList

public final class BinList
extends java.lang.Object

Version:
0.1 The BinList class provides a representation of a list of genomic positions grouped by bins for each chromosome of a genome. An intensity is associated to each bin. This class offers some tools allowing to gauss the values or to print a bedgraph file for example.
Author:
Julien Lajugie

Nested Class Summary
static class BinList.IntensityCalculation
          The enumeration intensityCalculation is used to specify how to calculate the intensity.

createMatchList

private void createMatchList(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> positionList)
Returns a list containing how many matches there is for each bin. Goes through the list of positions and increment the intensity of a bin every time a new matching sequence in this bin is found.

Parameters:
positionList - List of positions.

createIntensityList

private void createIntensityList(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> positionList,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> intensityList)
Returns a list containing a value of intensity for each bin. It goes through the list of positions and a list of intensities and load the BinList from this data.

Parameters:
positionList - List of positions.
intensityList - List of intensities.

createIntensityListMax

private void createIntensityListMax(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> positionList,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> intensityList)
Returns a list containing a value of intensity for each bin. It goes through the list of positions and a list of intensities and load the BinList from this data. If more than one position is found for one bin, the intensity of the bin is the maximum of the intensities of the positions.

Parameters:
positionList - List of positions.
intensityList - List of intensities.

createIntensityListSum

private void createIntensityListSum(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> positionList,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> intensityList)
Returns a list containing a value of intensity for each bin. It goes through the list of positions and a list of intensities and load the BinList from this data. If more than one position is found for one bin, the intensity of the bin is the sum of the intensities of the positions

Parameters:
positionList - List of positions.
intensityList - List of intensities.

createIntensityListAvg

private void createIntensityListAvg(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> positionList,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> intensityList)
Returns a list containing a value of intensity for each bin. It goes through the list of positions and a list of intensities and load the BinList from this data. If more than one position is found for one bin, the intensity of the bin is the average of the intensities of the positions

Parameters:
positionList - List of positions.
intensityList - List of intensities.

minus

public BinList minus(BinList aBinList)
              throws gdpcore.BinListNullException,
                     gdpcore.BinListNoDataException,
                     gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException
Subtracts the current list by the list in parameter.

Parameters:
aBinList - BinList we are subtracting.
Returns:
New BinList resulting from the subtraction.

divideBy

public BinList divideBy(BinList controlList,
                        int filter,
                        boolean normalized)
                 throws gdpcore.BinListNullException,
                        gdpcore.BinListNoDataException,
                        gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException
Divides the current list by a control list for every bin where the controlList value is higher than the value of filter. The result is normalized by the length of each list if the parameter normalized is set to true.

Parameters:
controlList - BinList used as control.
filter - Value used as a filter.
normalized - Set this parameter to true in order to normalize the result.
Returns:
New BinList resulting from the division.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNullException
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException

           throws gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

public void printWiggleFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                            java.lang.String wiggleName)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
Prints the BinList of matches in a file with the Wiggle format.

Parameters:
filePath - Address of the file.
wiggleName - Name of the bedGraph
Throws:
java.io.IOException
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

normalize

public BinList normalize(int factor)
                  throws gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
Divides each bin by the total of reads in the file. The result is multiply by the parameter 'factor' in order to have values easier to read. The result is returned in a new BinList

Parameters:
factor -
Returns:
New BinList resulting from the normalization.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

gauss

public BinList gauss(int sigma)
              throws gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
Applies a gaussian filter on the BinList and returns the result in a new BinList. Sigma is used to configure the gaussian filter.

Parameters:
sigma - Configure the gaussian filter.
Returns:
New BinList resulting from the gaussian filter.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

indexByChromo

public BinList indexByChromo(double saturation)
                      throws gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
Indexes the intensities between 0 and 100 based on the highest and the lowest value of each chromosome.

Parameters:
saturation - percentage of the highest and lowest value saturated.
Returns:
New BinList resulting from the indexing.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

index

public BinList index(double saturation)
              throws gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
Indexes the intensities between 0 and 100 based on the highest and the lowest value of the whole genome.

Parameters:
saturation - percentage of the highest and lowest value saturated.
Returns:
New BinList resulting from the indexing.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

correlation

public double correlation(BinList list)
                   throws gdpcore.BinListNullException,
                          gdpcore.BinListNoDataException,
                          gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException
Computes the coefficient of correlation between the current BinList and another BinList.

Parameters:
list - BinList we want to compare to the current BinList.
Returns:
The coefficient of correlation between the two lists.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNullException
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException

correlation

public double correlation(BinList list,
                          boolean[] chromoList)
                   throws gdpcore.BinListNullException,
                          gdpcore.BinListNoDataException,
                          gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException
Computes the coefficient of correlation between the current BinList and another BinList. Only the chromosomes set to true in chromoList will be used in the calculation.

Parameters:
list - BinList we want to compare to the current BinList.
chromoList - Set to true each chromosome of this list that you want to use in the calculation.
Returns:
The coefficient of correlation between the two lists.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNullException
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException

log

public BinList log(double damper)
            throws gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
Applies the function f(x) = log2(x + damper) to each element x of the current BinList. Returns the result in a new BinList.

Parameters:
damper - This parameter could be used to damp the signal.
Returns:
A new binList resulting of the calculation.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

Returns:
The smallest value of the current bin list.

gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

Returns:
The biggest value of the current bin list.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

slope

public void slope(double allowedGap,
                  int allowedKO,
                  int allowedLength,
                  java.lang.String filePath)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
Computes the slope of a BinList. To be accepted a slope can't change more than +/- allowedGap on at least allowedLength bins. We accept a maximum of allowedKO consecutive slopes that doesn't fit in the +/- allowedGap criterion. The result is written in a file.

Parameters:
allowedGap - Maximum gap allowed between two slopes.
allowedKO - Maximum consecutive slopes that doesn't fit in the '+/- allowedGap' criterion.
allowedLength - Minimum length of a slope.
filePath - Path of the output file containing the result.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

averageArrayListOfDouble

private double averageArrayListOfDouble(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> slopeArray)
Returns the biggest Double of an ArrayList of Double.

Parameters:
slopeArray - ArrayList of double.
Returns:
The biggest element of the ArrayList.

repartition

public void repartition(double intensityBinsSize,
                        java.lang.String filePath)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
Creates bins of intensity with a size of intensityBinsSize, and computes how many bins of the BinList there is in each bin of intensity. Writes the result in a file.

Parameters:
intensityBinsSize - Size of the bins of intensities.
filePath - Output file containing the result.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

distanceOnIntensity

public void distanceOnIntensity(BinList listDistance,
                                double thresholdDown,
                                double thresholdUp,
                                int distanceNoInfluence,
                                java.lang.String filePath)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                gdpcore.BinListNullException,
                                gdpcore.BinListNoDataException,
                                gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException
Calculates for every genomic position the timing of replication and the distance to the closest gene expressed between thresholdDown and thresholdUp and at least distanceNoInfluence bins far from more expressed genes. The current BinList indicates the copy number of genomic position. The result is written in a file.

Parameters:
listDistance - BinList containing information about gene expression.
thresholdDown - High threshold.
thresholdUp - Low threshold.
distanceNoInfluence - Distance to more expressed genes where we don't want to do the calculation.
filePath - Output file for the result.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
gdpcore.BinListNullException
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException

selectFromThreshold

private BinList selectFromThreshold(double thresholdDown,
                                    double thresholdUp)
                             throws gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
Returns a list with values set to 1 when for the values of the current list between thresholdDown and thresholdUp and 0 otherwise.

Parameters:
thresholdDown - High threshold.
thresholdUp - Low threshold.
Returns:
A new BinList.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

computeDistance

private BinList computeDistance()
                         throws gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
Computes the distance to the expressed genes of the current list.

Returns:
A list of distance.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException

computeDistanceNoInfluence

private BinList computeDistanceNoInfluence(BinList listThresholdHighGenes,
                                           int distanceNoInfluence)
                                    throws gdpcore.BinListNullException,
                                           gdpcore.BinListNoDataException,
                                           gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException
Deletes the values of the current list under influence of genes more expressed of the listThresholdHighGenes. The influence zone is controlled by the parameter distanceNoInfluence.

Parameters:
listThresholdHighGenes - List of more expressed genes.
distanceNoInfluence - Distance to more expressed genes where we don't want to do the calculation.
Returns:
A BinList containing the current list without values for the positions under influence.
Throws:
gdpcore.BinListNullException
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException

printDistanceOnIntensity

private void printDistanceOnIntensity(BinList listDistance,
                                      java.lang.String filePath)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      gdpcore.BinListNullException,
                                      gdpcore.BinListNoDataException,
                                      gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException
Prints the values of distances on intensities in a file. The current list contains the values of intensities.

Parameters:
listDistance - BinList containing the values of distance.
filePath - Path to the output result file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
gdpcore.BinListNullException
gdpcore.BinListNoDataException
gdpcore.BinListDifferentWindowSizeException
